plot: The drama continues when the ladies return from the shore, as Paul tells Dolores she needs to establish boundaries with Frank. Melissa and Teresa have differing opinions of Louie's involvement in their family issues. Rachel and her husband consider the steps needed for her to legally adopt Jaiden. Dolores and Jennifer attempt to mend their friendship over lunch, where Jennifer opens up about her marriage issues. Together they host a coffee reading, where lingering tension between Margaret and Jennifer comes to a head. Danielle reveals how betrayed she feels over the girls questioning her words and Rachel stabbing her in the back. Melissa learns who Teresa's newest bridesmaids are after one drops out.—Anonymous
